title: Processed DEM Products – Kansas Frontier Matrix
description: Collection of processed digital elevation model (DEM) datasets for Kansas. Includes statewide 1-meter resolution DEMs (2018–2020) and derivative products (hillshade, slope, aspect) prepared as Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs (COGs) for analysis and visualization. These layers support terrain analysis, hydrological modeling, and historical landscape reconstruction within the Kansas-Frontier-Matrix hub.

providers.name: Kansas Data Access and Support Center (DASC)

traceability.processing: DEM tiles mosaicked, reprojected to EPSG:4269, converted to Cloud-Optimized GeoTIFFs with GDAL 3.6. Derivatives (hillshade, slope, aspect) created using gdaldem.
